Author: phm87#7395
Content: you don't need a BTC node nor BTC address for testnet of NN. BTC address and node are required if you are elected as Notary Node

Author: phm87#7395
Content: but yes you should fund KMD, PIZZA, BEER and TXSCLCC

Author: phm87#7395
Content: about PIZZA and BEER, I heard that there is a faucet (or ppl here can send some to you) and for TXSCLCC, you can mine some with 1 thread of CPU

Author: phm87#7395
Content:
``komodo-cli -ac_name=TXSCLCC setgenerate true 1`` to start mining
``komodo-cli -ac_name=TXSCLCC setgenerate false`` to stop mining

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: how many utxo will you blast typically for a dwy attack ? In case of being attacked, can I just merge it by self sendtoaddress, or the tx size will be too big if I do that way ?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: not sure... to be effective against the entire network, he may need to send a million tx's

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: to take out a single notary a few hundred k would be enough...

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: merging small amounts is pie with any method

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: but once it gets over some threshold... you cant send the tx in blocks becaus they are full... its a very expenisive attack though... only really possible on a chin liek BEER

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: doing sendtoaddress with minconfs=1 would likely do it... but will also eat all your split utxos to notarize
